Html:
Hi,
How can I use this in SSRS report?

I used this:

FIRST:
I wrote easy method for convert QrCode.Matrix to byte array into QrEncoder class

SECOND:
http://www.codeproject.com/Articles/789254/How-to-embed-Barcodes-in-your-SSRS-report

where Class name: Gma.QrCodeNet.Encoding.QrEncoder

and Code:
Public Function Convert(Text As String) As Byte()
       Dim bitmapData As Byte() = Nothing

   bitmapData = bar.EncodeToBytes(Text)

       Return bitmapData
End Function

THIRD:
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/13379804/could-not-load-file-or-assembly-in-reporting-services

AND LAST:
add to assembly:
gacutil -i Gma.QrCodeNet.Encoding.dll
